text: Rufus Lige Edmisten (born July 12, 1941) is an American attorney and politician. He was the 46th Attorney General of North Carolina from 1974 until 1984. He was the 21st Secretary of State of North Carolina from 1989 to 1996. Edmisten was the Democratic nominee for Governor of North Carolina in the 1984 election, losing to Republican James G. Martin. ==References== ==Other websites== *Edmisten & Webb *Profile at OurCampaigns.com *Foundation for Good Business: Extra Special Super Kids Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:North Carolina attorneys general Category:Politicians from North Carolina Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Rufus Edmisten
